resources.string: Tap the screen "\n" after each "\n" beat of the heart

" "All you need is to palpate arterial pulse and tap the screen after every beat of the heart. Or you can ask someone to do this for you."\n" " "You have an opportunity to save your results with comment. Then you can view results in History and remove some items from list."\n" " "Statistics show you chart of results at selected period. Chart would help you to plan your trainings by indicating your individual heart rate zones of load.
Here your pulse is over your maximum heart rate.Stop training. If heart rate stay in this zone too long, you need a doctor
In this zone, you’re improving your maximum performance capacity. Training at this intensity level is recommended for short periods of time. Be careful here.
Workouts in this zone help to improve aerobic fitness (your body’s utilization of oxygen) and delay the fatigue caused by lactic acid
At a light intensity, this zone enhances your endurance and the efficiency with which you use fat and carbohydrates as fuel.
This zone encourages the flow of blood, which is key to maintaining a healthy heart and improving recovery after difficult workouts.
Heart rate is slow, but it may be individual norm of resting heart rate.
Your heart rate is too slow. You need a doctor.
Let me explain"\n"to you how to work"\n"with me!
Tap the screen after"\n"each beat of the heart
Build a chart for"\n"the selected period"\n"of measurements
